title: "How medical AI devices are evaluated: limitations and recommendations from an analysis of FDA approvals"
excerpt: "A comprehensive overview of medical AI devices approved by the US Food and Drug Administration sheds new light on limitations of the evaluation process that can mask vulnerabilities of devices when they are deployed on patients."
